name: constrict
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
